I recently stayed at this stunning five-star hotel, and it exceeded all my expectations! From the moment I arrived, I was treated to top-notch service and unparalleled luxury. The hotel's design blended elegance with modern amenities, creating a sophisticated and comfortable atmosphere.

Highlights of the Stay
- *Luxurious Rooms*: Spacious, beautifully decorated rooms with premium bedding and cutting-edge tech.
- *Exceptional Dining*: World-class restaurants serving gourmet cuisine with impeccable service.
- *Outstanding Amenities*: State-of-the-art fitness center, rejuvenating spa, and sparkling pool.
- *Attentive Staff*: Friendly, professional staff anticipating needs and ensuring a flawless stay.

This five-star hotel is a perfect choice for discerning travelers seeking luxury, comfort, and outstanding service. Whether for business or leisure, you'll experience unmatched hospitality and amenities. Highly recommended!

text.text:
The St. Regis Mumbai in Lower Parel is a very popular choice for couples, and for good reason. Here's a review based on common experiences, tailored to a stay with your wife:
A Romantic Getaway at The St. Regis Mumbai
My wife and I recently had the pleasure of staying at The St. Regis Mumbai, and it was a truly exceptional experience. From the moment we stepped into the elegant lobby, we were enveloped in a sense of luxury and warmth that made our romantic getaway feel incredibly special.
The location is a definite highlight. Situated in Lower Parel, it's a great base for exploring the city, and the direct connection to the Phoenix Palladium mall is a huge plus. We enjoyed the convenience of having high-end shops, a variety of dining options, and entertainment right at our fingertips, without even having to step outside.
Our room was a sanctuary of comfort and style. The city views were breathtaking, and the plush, high-quality bedding and thoughtful amenities made it easy to relax and unwind. The bathrooms are particularly impressive, with luxurious marble, rainfall showers, and deep-soaking bathtubs that were perfect for a relaxing evening. The attention to detail in the housekeeping was also commendable, with the room kept spotless throughout our stay.
The service is where The St. Regis truly shines. The personalized butler service is a standout feature, and our butler was incredibly attentive and proactive, anticipating our needs and making sure every request was met. The staff across the hotel were friendly, welcoming, and professional, and many guests have noted that they went above and beyond to make their stay memorable. We felt like royalty from start to finish.
For a couple's stay, the amenities are a dream. We took full advantage of the spa, which offers couples' treatment rooms, and it was a wonderfully rejuvenating experience. The outdoor pool on the 10th floor, with its poolside bar and cabanas, provided a perfect spot to relax and enjoy the Mumbai skyline.
Dining was a culinary adventure. The hotel has a fantastic selection of restaurants, and the breakfast buffet at Seven Kitchens was a particular highlight. The spread is immense, offering everything from international favorites to local Indian delicacies, and the quality was superb. We also enjoyed the evening cocktail hours, which added an extra touch of sophistication to our evenings.
In conclusion, our stay at The St. Regis Mumbai was everything we had hoped for and more. The combination of stunning rooms, excellent location, and, most importantly, the unmatched service and hospitality makes it an ideal choice for a romantic retreat. It’s a place that knows how to make you feel pampered and valued, creating memories that will last a lifetime. We are already looking forward to our next visit.

text.text:
I had an absolutely exceptional experience at The St. Regis Mumbai. From the moment I arrived, the attention to detail and level of hospitality were second to none.

Rooms:
The rooms are luxurious, spacious, and impeccably maintained. The blend of comfort and elegance makes it a perfect retreat after a busy day. The city views are stunning, and the in-room amenities are top-tier.

Services:
Every service provided was timely, professional, and seamless. From concierge assistance to room service, everything was handled with care and precision.

Ambience:
The hotel has a grand, refined ambiance that perfectly balances modern sophistication with classic charm. Every corner feels curated and serene — ideal for both relaxation and business.

Food:
Absolutely phenomenal! Whether it's breakfast, fine dining, or room service, every meal was a treat. The variety and quality of the food reflect the hotel’s world-class standards.

Staff:
The highlight of the stay! The staff is genuinely warm, attentive, and always willing to go the extra mile. Their hospitality truly enhances the overall experience.

Disco/Nightclub:
This was the only disappointing part of the experience. The disco was overcrowded to the point of being uncomfortable, and they kept letting more people in — it honestly felt like being in a Mumbai local train during peak hours. Despite spending ₹5,000, there wasn’t even space to dance. It seriously takes away from the premium feel the rest of the hotel offers.

Overall:
Aside from the nightclub experience, The St. Regis Mumbai exceeded all expectations. It’s a perfect destination for anyone looking for luxury, comfort, and top-tier service. I would absolutely return — just might skip the disco next time.

text.text:
I stayed at The St. Regis Mumbai for a week on a work trip, and it was an excellent experience from start to finish. The rooms were exceptionally clean, well-maintained, and thoughtfully appointed—perfect for both work and relaxation.

The staff were consistently attentive, courteous, and genuinely kind, which made a big difference during a busy week. The breakfast buffet was a daily highlight, offering a wide variety of fresh and delicious options to suit every palate.

A special mention to the wellness facilities—the steam room, sauna, and jacuzzi in the locker area were a much-needed retreat after long workdays. It’s rare to find a hotel that gets the balance of luxury and functionality so right. Highly recommended for both business and leisure stays!

text.text:
Review: A Flawless Stay at the New Fairmont Mumbai – A True Masterpiece

From the moment we stepped into the Fairmont Mumbai, it was evident that this hotel is in a league of its own. The grandeur of the all–Art Deco design is breathtaking—timeless, sophisticated, and executed with precision in every detail. The caliber of the facilities is nothing short of extraordinary. From the rooms to the common spaces, every corner of the property exudes elegance and modern luxury. I simply could not be more positive about what this hotel has to offer.

What truly sets the Fairmont Mumbai apart, however, is the service and the culinary experience. The hospitality was unmatched—every interaction with the team felt warm, thoughtful, and refined. The staff were not only attentive, but intuitive, anticipating needs before they were even voiced. Their attention to detail and genuine commitment to guest satisfaction elevated the entire experience.

Each of the hotel's venues is a destination in itself. The tea room was serene and refined, offering a perfectly curated experience. The bar was stylish and vibrant, with an exceptional cocktail list and atmosphere to match. And the restaurants—plural, because each one is distinctly impressive—offered immense volume in terms of variety, flavour, and quality. The food was impeccable, showcasing culinary craftsmanship and an eye for presentation.

In every respect—design, service, cuisine, and ambiance—the Fairmont Mumbai delivers excellence. It is not just a new hotel; it is a new benchmark for luxury in India. An absolute triumph.

originalText.text:
Review: A Flawless Stay at the New Fairmont Mumbai – A True Masterpiece

From the moment we stepped into the Fairmont Mumbai, it was evident that this hotel is in a league of its own. The grandeur of the all–Art Deco design is breathtaking—timeless, sophisticated, and executed with precision in every detail. The caliber of the facilities is nothing short of extraordinary. From the rooms to the common spaces, every corner of the property exudes elegance and modern luxury. I simply could not be more positive about what this hotel has to offer.

What truly sets the Fairmont Mumbai apart, however, is the service and the culinary experience. The hospitality was unmatched—every interaction with the team felt warm, thoughtful, and refined. The staff were not only attentive, but intuitive, anticipating needs before they were even voiced. Their attention to detail and genuine commitment to guest satisfaction elevated the entire experience.

Each of the hotel's venues is a destination in itself. The tea room was serene and refined, offering a perfectly curated experience. The bar was stylish and vibrant, with an exceptional cocktail list and atmosphere to match. And the restaurants—plural, because each one is distinctly impressive—offered immense volume in terms of variety, flavour, and quality. The food was impeccable, showcasing culinary craftsmanship and an eye for presentation.

In every respect—design, service, cuisine, and ambiance—the Fairmont Mumbai delivers excellence. It is not just a new hotel; it is a new benchmark for luxury in India. An absolute triumph.

editorialSummary.text: Grand hotel offering refined quarters, plus upscale dining, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text:
This hotel truly lives up to its reputation as a luxury destination. The rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and exceptionally comfortable. The breakfast spread and overall food quality are outstanding—an absolute delight for the palate. What stood out most was the staff—extremely courteous, cooperative, and always ready to assist, with warm smiles that make you feel genuinely welcome.

Its proximity to the airport makes it an excellent choice for transit or business travelers, although do note that the surrounding locality doesn’t offer much in terms of entertainment or dining options.

I spent two days here with my sons and overall, our experience was very pleasant. However, I would like to bring one matter to the management’s attention. My 12-year-old son, an aspiring photographer, was carrying his professional camera as he had planned some photography work in Mumbai. While entering the hotel lobby, he was unexpectedly questioned about why he had a camera and was told it wasn’t allowed. I was quite taken aback by this interaction—it's surprising and disheartening to see a young student’s passion being questioned in such a setting.

Apart from this one incident, everything else about the stay was impeccable. I hope the management reflects on this for future guest experiences, especially when it involves children and their creativity.

text.text:
Review for ITC Maratha – A Truly Memorable and Comfortable Stay

I recently had the pleasure of staying at ITC Maratha while accompanying my husband on his business trip, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of exceptional.

Right from the moment we arrived, the hospitality and warmth shown by the staff made us feel at home. The rooms were beautifully maintained and offered the perfect balance of comfort and luxury.

A special mention to Chef Patil ji, who greeted us every morning at breakfast with a warm smile and a spread of absolutely delicious food. His personal touch and attention to our preferences made every breakfast feel special and homely. It was such a delightful way to start the day!

Another big thank you to Pushpalata ji from the room service team, who took great care in keeping our room just the way we liked it. She was always polite, attentive, and ensured that every little detail was taken care of, which truly enhanced our comfort.

What touched us the most was the way ITC Maratha made my husband's birthday extra special. We were pleasantly surprised with a beautifully arranged cake, a bouquet of fresh flowers, and a lovely fruit basket waiting in our room. It was such a thoughtful gesture and made the day truly memorable for both of us.

Thank you, ITC Maratha, for a stay filled with warmth, care, and thoughtful touches. We’ll always remember this experience fondly and look forward to visiting again!

Overall, ITC Maratha delivers a refined and comfortable experience with excellent hospitality and an unbeatable location.

text.text:
One of My Best Stays – Thank You, JW Marriott!

This is my first detailed review, and it’s going to be a long one — but that’s because my experience with JW Marriott was truly exceptional.

From the moment we arrived, everything about the hotel impressed us — the location, the ambiance, and the attention to detail in every nook and corner. I especially want to highlight the Sauna and the Breakfast Buffet, both of which were absolutely top-notch.

However, this review isn’t just about the facilities.

What truly stood out was the incredible service during a time of need. During our stay, my wife fell ill, and I had a flight scheduled for 9:00 PM. I requested a late check-out to accommodate her rest and recovery — and the hotel graciously agreed without hesitation. This small gesture made a huge difference to us, and I am extremely thankful for the compassion and flexibility they showed.

A special thanks to Andrez, Jivanth, and Lalit — your professionalism and kindness did not go unnoticed. You truly represent the best of Marriott’s values.

Special Mention to Martin
Thank you again, JW Marriott, for making our stay so comfortable and memorable!

originalText.text:
One of My Best Stays – Thank You, JW Marriott!

This is my first detailed review, and it’s going to be a long one — but that’s because my experience with JW Marriott was truly exceptional.

From the moment we arrived, everything about the hotel impressed us — the location, the ambiance, and the attention to detail in every nook and corner. I especially want to highlight the Sauna and the Breakfast Buffet, both of which were absolutely top-notch.

However, this review isn’t just about the facilities.

What truly stood out was the incredible service during a time of need. During our stay, my wife fell ill, and I had a flight scheduled for 9:00 PM. I requested a late check-out to accommodate her rest and recovery — and the hotel graciously agreed without hesitation. This small gesture made a huge difference to us, and I am extremely thankful for the compassion and flexibility they showed.

A special thanks to Andrez, Jivanth, and Lalit — your professionalism and kindness did not go unnoticed. You truly represent the best of Marriott’s values.

Special Mention to Martin
Thank you again, JW Marriott, for making our stay so comfortable and memorable!

text.text:
JW Marriott Juhu has been one of my favourite stays in the past — I’ve had a full sea view room before, and the experience was truly top-notch. That’s why I chose it again for a special celebration — our birthday and anniversary stay.

This time, I booked over a phone call and clearly mentioned our wish for a full sea view room. Unfortunately, the staff didn’t communicate the room details properly. We ended up with a partial view, and worse — the window was dirty, making the view even less enjoyable. Despite informing the reception, no action was taken, which was disappointing for a returning guest on a special occasion.

That said, there were some clear highlights:
•	The spa was exceptional — from the sauna, steam, cold bath, whirlpool jacuzzi, to the relaxation room, everything was serene, clean, and truly therapeutic. The staff there deserves appreciation for their warm and attentive service.
•	The swimming pool was another plus — especially the saltwater pool, which was a refreshing and unique experience.
•	The breakfast spread was fantastic — a great mix of Indian and international options, fresh fruits, juices, live counters, and excellent coffee. A perfect start to the morning.

Overall, while parts of the stay were memorable, the room experience and lack of proactive service left us a little let down — especially as returning guests celebrating something personal. Still, the property has its charm, and hopefully, with better communication, future stays can be closer to the standard we once loved.

Overall, the hospitality was outstanding. Truly a memorable experience—we can't wait to return!

text.text:
I recently stayed at The Leela Mumbai, and while the property is stunning and well-maintained, a few things left me thinking twice before I book again.

✅ What stood out (and deserves applause):
•	Citrus – Breakfast Buffet: Exceptional. The spread, freshness, and flavors were top-tier. A must-experience.
•	Cleanliness & Amenities: Rooms were spotless, beds comfortable, and all amenities including spa, sauna, and swimming pool were well-managed and relaxing.
•	Location: You really can’t beat it — central, premium, and peaceful.
•	Special Mention: Paaji (Doorman/Host): A true gem! Right from the entrance, he made us feel at home. He greeted us with a respectful Namaste, handled our luggage smoothly, and opened the doors with genuine warmth. That’s the kind of welcome you expect from a luxury brand.

❌ Where things fell flat:
•	Customer Relations: I emailed my room preferences (pool view, specific requests) well before arrival — but received no response, and none of the requests were honored.
•	Check-In Experience: Disappointing. The receptionist was cold and unwelcoming, no smile, no welcome drink, no personal touch. It felt like we were just another room number to him — not the Leela standard at all.
•	Room Allocation: The main reason I booked Leela was for the view over the swimming pool, and it wasn’t provided even after communicating it in advance.

⚖️ Final Thoughts:

The property is absolutely worth experiencing — beautiful interiors, relaxing amenities, and standout hospitality by individuals like Paaji.
But the front desk team and guest communication need serious improvement if The Leela wants to continue being a name that stands for luxury.

Will I return? Maybe — but I’ll think twice, and only after ensuring better pre-arrival communication.

text.text:
🌟 Excellent Stay at Hotel Sahara Star!

I had a really pleasant experience staying at Hotel Sahara Star during my recent trip. From the moment I arrived, the staff was welcoming and efficient—check-in was smooth and quick. The room was spacious, spotlessly clean, and well-maintained with all the basic amenities you’d expect. The bed was comfortable, and I appreciated the quiet atmosphere after a long day of travel.

The location is unbeatable—right across from the bus stand, which made getting around super convenient. I also liked that they had an in-house restaurant with decent food. Breakfast was simple but tasty, and the service was prompt. Special thanks to the front desk staff, especially Santhosh, who was polite and always ready to help with any queries.

What stood out most was the value for money. For the price, you get excellent service, comfort, and convenience. I’d definitely recommend Hotel Sahara Star to anyone looking for a reliable.

Would happily stay again!

text.text:
I had an amazing experience at Hotel Sahara Star, located right opposite Mumbai Domestic Airport. From the moment you step into the hotel, you’re greeted with warm hospitality and a stunning ambience. The iconic dome structure and the beautiful indoor lagoon with live fish create a truly unique and relaxing atmosphere.

The rooms are spacious, clean, and well-equipped with modern amenities. The bed was super comfortable, and the view of the airport runway added an exciting touch to the stay. The soundproofing is excellent – you feel close to the airport without the noise.

The dining options are exceptional – from global cuisines to authentic Indian flavors. Especially loved the experience at Mabruk and Ocean – The Private Dining Room with its aquarium setting. The breakfast buffet is lavish with plenty of variety for all tastes.

The staff deserves a special mention – they are extremely courteous, attentive, and go the extra mile to make your stay memorable.

Whether you’re visiting for business, leisure, or a special occasion, Sahara Star offers everything you’d expect from a five-star experience. Highly recommended for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Mumbai!

Gautam took care of my room and was very attentive and thorough.  The front desk staff was incredibly nice and prompt.  The lounge staff were nice.  Attentive the way your parents take care of you, so much love that it would be annoying if they gave a little more

Proximity to the mall was an unexpected plus.

Oh the gym was functional but they should buy heavier dumbbells :). Hey everyone needs an area of improvement

Hospitality is dead at this hotel.

text.text:
Overall experience: 4/5. Green spacious property near Oberoi mall, but staff need to come together to deliver a good experience. Westin really needs to fix the house keeping security gap, pre-arrival experience and chef glitches. Most of the folks try harder ( like Ms.Jasmina, head of Housekeeping/Rooms, lounge staff ,the female sous chef etc) to ensure a great experience while others like the front desk, the male sous chef etc doesn't give a damn bringing down the overall experience.

More details below -

Pre-arrival Experience: 1/5. No body called and checked on the arrival time, we wanted an airport pickup which didn't happen, nobody even picked the call at their hotel number given. No response to chat either and finally when I got a call back and while conversing with a staff , she abruptly cut the call. Not a typical Marriott experience to start with, disappointing

Arrival Experience: 5/5. After the disastrous pre-arrival experience, Ms.Jasmina stepped in and fixed the experience for us, with a quick call,  an upgrade and welcomed us with providing a small cake and helped us with the occasion celebration welcome as well.

Rooms: 4.5/5. Spacious, huge rooms which is rare in Mumbai. View is off the highways and walking space around the property. Very close to Oberoi Mall.

Privacy/Safety + Housekeeping : 3/5. We had a huge security incident involving housekeeping. Ms. Jasmina again stepped in, apologized, brought the issue to the attention of the relevant people and helped sorting it out. Other than that, requests were promptly attended to, cleanliness was maintained.

Food : 4/5. We had dinner and breakfast. Dinner lacked continental and seafood. Apparently they had pasta which the team never informed us, which was surprising. The varieties were there at both time and the female sous chef was super friendly ensuring the concerns were addressed. During breakfast, they ensured we get French toast. The male sous chef ( I guess) was super rude and when I asked for koki , he said " Go, talk to the server and place the order, not to me" if so, he shouldn't hang around the food counter and ask what do people want. If he doesn't want to do what's asked, then he shouldn't ask. Bizarre behavior. During dinner, they struggled to manage the crowd. A huge container of uncooked chicken was kept in the open kitchen behind the food counters for a long time which wasn't a good health indicator.

Few glitches needs to be addressed which is evident from the other reviews as well.

editorialSummary.text: High-end hotel with sea views & multiple restaurants, plus a spa, an outdoor pool & a hot tub.

text.text:
Our stay at the Taj Lands End was absolutely exceptional – far beyond perfect! The location is truly stunning, offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea and the iconic Worli Sea Link. Our room was incredibly spacious and well-appointed with all the luxury amenities one could desire. The staff were consistently polite and provided top-notch hospitality throughout our stay.

What truly stood out was the beautifully designed kids' area. The inclusion of the small rabbit enclosure, fish pond, and bird area was a unique and delightful touch that our children absolutely loved. It created a wonderful atmosphere for them. Staying here felt like an escape from the hustle and bustle of Mumbai, allowing us to spend quality time with our family in a serene and luxurious setting. We highly recommend the Taj Lands End for a memorable and rejuvenating experience.

Hotel have activities for all age groups, be it enjoying with friends and family in 2 swimming pools or taking a stroll in private gardens or riding a cycle around or kids having a playtime. With great gym and even better trainers, you can continue to work on your fitness while on the trip.

With easy access and proximity to iconic places this place is a worth stay!

text.text:
I had a not so good experience during my stay from 29th to 30th June 2025 (Sunday & Monday). I had booked 2 rooms and asked for an early Check in. I reached the Hotel by 1pm. I was given one room around 2pm which was a twin bed, while I had booked for a King bed. My family was sitting in the allotted room for almost 2 hours uncomfortably. After much follow up, I was given one room with king bed and had again to wait for another room for a while. Finally I got second room around 3.45 pm.I had plans to take rest and go for a swim in the pool, but because of the delayed check in, all my plans went for a toss. One of the rooms allotted had an uncleaned window therby obstructing the sea view for which I had specifically booked.

Next day morning, for breakfast at 9.30 am, there were 15 people waiting in the line outside the restaurant. We were asked to go to the other restaurant below. I had asked for a table for 5 which was given with 5 chairs and  only 4 table mats. Had to again wait for sometime requesting them to put the mat and the cutlery. Most of the food items were not even warm. Taste was just so so. Had to wait for bowls for sambar.

Overall, our high expectations of a great weekend at a reputed hotel was not satisfactory.

text.text:
I had an absolutely wonderful experience at Taj The Trees, Mumbai. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, professional, and extremely attentive to every detail. The ambience is modern yet serene, blending luxury with comfort perfectly.

The rooms are spacious, beautifully designed, and equipped with every amenity you could ask for. Dining here is a delight — the food is fresh, flavorful, and presented with great care. The breakfast spread, in particular, is outstanding with a wide variety of options.

What stood out the most was the impeccable hospitality — the team goes above and beyond to ensure every guest feels valued and cared for. Whether it’s the housekeeping, front desk, or restaurant staff, everyone greets you with a smile and genuine warmth.

A truly world-class stay in the heart of Mumbai — highly recommended for both business and leisure travelers. I will definitely return!

I stayed with my family at Tau The Trees, Mumbai for 2 nights in July 2025. The hotel is located in a quiet place away from the hustle and bustle of the city, with a beautiful view of greenery and mangroves.

The rooms were very clean and tastefully decorated. The bathrooms were also clean and modern. The staff was extremely polite and helpful, especially Mrinali ji at the reception who took care of everything.

The breakfast was delicious and varied. The pool area and lobby are very attractive. The hotel has a peaceful surrounding, but it is a bit far from the main city.

Positives:
✔ Beautiful and clean rooms
✔ Excellent staff service
✔ Delicious food and breakfast
✔ Natural environment

text.text:
Beautiful Hotel at a lovely location. Enjoyed the weekend of Independence day.
We did the booking directly with Taj. They were so helpful from the start,, Rohit the Asst Manager took care of all our needs specially for my old parents who needed a room for specially abled.
Check in process was smooth and perfect. Jasmeet had contacted us before our check in and made lovely decorations for our celebration of 85th Birthday as well as for Anniversary. Jasmeet said she was our one point contact for all our needs but unfortunately after we checked in she hardly responded to our queries.
We had booked 4 rooms. We had 2 pool facing rooms as those are the only ones for the specially abled people and 2 Mangrove view rooms which have an excellent view. You must choose mangrove view. Prachi did a very smooth check in for all our rooms.
The rooms are large and the bathroom has all ammentites. The Bathroom is designed so well that has a bath tub and separate enclosure for Toilet and bathroom.
The Houskeeping staff was very prompt. Specially Harshali who always attended to our requirements and she cleaned the rooms perfectly. Was very impressive.
The in room dining attended to all our needs and services but the timeline for serving should be improved as we had to call many times.
The hotel had made lovely arrangements for Independence day celebrations. They had tea coffee and snacks in the lobby with classical dance and music. They even had sweet dish plate in our rooms.
The Breakfast at  Shamiana was superb. The spread was fabulous with so much variety for Veg and Non veg. There were so many options in live counter for dosas, eggs, pancakes, parathas, puris, french toast etc. Maybe one day would love to drive down just for breakfast.
Maybe one improvement can be made is to have a small play area for kids which we missed.
The ground level also has banquet rooms and ballroom. This will be good for destination wedding or corporate events.
Another beautiful highlight we saw was the way the hotel security lowered the flag after sunset and completed the formality with respect. The true way to do it even when nobody is watching. Was very proud of Taj Trees

editorialSummary.text: Luxe seafront hotel offering multiple dining options, an elegant spa & a ballroom.

text.text:
Guest Feedback – Breakfast Experience

I truly appreciate the quality of service and facilities provided by the hotel—everything is excellent except the breakfast experience.

As an international and globally recognized hotel brand, I expected the breakfast to reflect that standard. Unfortunately, it falls short in several areas:
•	The breakfast lacks international variety and is repeated every day without any change, which becomes boring and does not meet five-star expectations.
•	The food quality is not up to international standards, and there’s no care taken by the restaurant management to improve or adjust the menu.
•	The restaurant staff are friendly and professional, but the management needs to pay closer attention to guest satisfaction, especially for such an important meal.

This feedback is meant as a constructive suggestion, because I believe a hotel of this reputation should offer a more dynamic, high-quality, and internationally appealing breakfast.

text.text:
Staying at the Taj Mahal Tower was an experience I’ll never forget. We booked the Apollo Suite, and right from the moment I walked in, it felt like I was stepping into a whole different world – one of royalty and luxury.

The welcome was grand and the staff were super warm and made sure everything was perfect from the get-go.

The suite was huge, super spacious, and absolutely stunning – easily one of the most beautiful rooms I’ve ever stayed in. Every little detail was taken care of, and the room had all the modern comforts you could ask for.

The food was amazing – packed with flavor and beautifully presented. Also the service was impeccable. Everyone was so attentive and kind, always ready to help with a smile.

The entire hotel has this magical, old-world charm that makes you feel like you’re in a dream. From the architecture to the vibe, everything screams elegance.

It’s totally worth it – something you should experience at least once in your life.

I recently stayed at this hotel in Colaba, and while the location is fantastic with easy access to the markets, the rooms are a letdown. The hotel itself is quite old, and it shows in the room's condition and size.

The breakfast is good, but the restaurant is small, which makes it quite crowded during peak hours. If you're planning to grab breakfast, be prepared to wait or arrive early.

*Pros:* Good location, decent breakfast
*Cons:* Old and small rooms, small restaurant gets crowded during breakfast.

Regarding breakfast, although a few restaurant staff were lovely/friendly, the bulk seemed unfocused & uninterested in being friendly or getting orders right or on time. Not a great experience.

The Taj Hotel Mumbai is an iconic luxury hotel situated in the heart of Mumbai, India. It is known for its breathtaking architecture, exquisite interior design, and exceptional hospitality services. The hotel has hosted numerous dignitaries, celebrities, and high-profile events, making it a symbol of India's rich cultural heritage.
The rooms at the Taj Hotel Mumbai are well-appointed and elegantly decorated, offering guests a luxurious and comfortable stay. The hotel boasts a range of amenities, including multiple dining options, a fitness center, spa services, and an outdoor pool.
One of the highlights of the Taj Hotel Mumbai is its unparalleled service. The staff is highly trained and dedicated to providing guests with an unforgettable experience. From the moment you arrive, you'll be greeted with warmth and hospitality, and every effort will be made to ensure that your stay is enjoyable and stress-free.
Overall, the Taj Hotel Mumbai is considered one of the best hotels in India, and for good reason. Its combination of luxurious amenities, stunning architecture, and impeccable service make it a must-visit destination for anyone looking for a memorable stay in Mumbai.

Five Stars – A Truly Exceptional Stay at Soho House Mumbai

From the moment I arrived at Soho House Mumbai, I was welcomed with warmth, professionalism, and an attention to detail that set the tone for an unforgettable stay. The property itself is stunning—effortlessly blending chic design with comfort and a laid-back, yet luxurious vibe.

What truly set this experience apart, however, was the exceptional service. Every staff member I encountered was gracious, attentive, and genuinely invested in making my stay special. A particular shout-out goes to Ishjeev, who went above and beyond on multiple occasions. Whether it was anticipating my needs before I even voiced them, offering thoughtful local recommendations, or ensuring every detail of my visit was seamless, Ishjeev’s level of care and commitment was nothing short of world-class. He truly embodies the spirit of hospitality that Soho House is known for.

The rooftop pool, the food, the ambiance—everything was outstanding. But it’s the people, especially Ishjeev, who made it extraordinary. I can’t wait to return.

text.text:
Title: A Memorable Babymoon Stay at Soho House, Mumbai

My wife and I had the pleasure of staying at Soho House in Mumbai for our babymoon in early January, and it was an experience we will cherish forever. The charm and elegance of this place are unmatched, and it's a destination I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a blend of luxury and comfort.

Firstly, the rooftop area was an absolute delight. The panoramic views of the city and the sea were breathtaking, providing the perfect backdrop for some tranquil moments away from the hustle and bustle of Mumbai. It's a great spot to unwind and soak in the beauty of the surroundings.

Dining at Cecconi's, the restaurant downstairs, was another highlight of our stay. The cuisine was exquisite, offering a wide range of tantalizing dishes that were a feast for both the eyes and the palate. The ambiance of the restaurant added to the dining experience, making every meal there memorable.

The room service at Soho House deserves a special mention. Prompt, courteous, and always with a smile, the staff made sure our every need was catered to. This level of service truly made us feel pampered and special throughout our stay.

Above all, our room and its amenities were the epitome of comfort and luxury. Every detail was thoughtfully designed to provide an unparalleled experience. The room was spacious, beautifully decorated, and equipped with everything we could possibly need. The attention to detail in the amenities provided added a touch of elegance and convenience to our stay.

In conclusion, our stay at Soho House, Mumbai was nothing short of exceptional. It's a perfect mix of luxury, comfort, and excellent service. I would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Mumbai, especially for a special occasion like a babymoon. Soho House has truly set a benchmark in hospitality, and we look forward to returning in the future.

text.text:
Fairmont Hotel Mumbai – The Definition of Ultra-Luxury

Having experienced Fairmont hotels in Cairo, Dubai, and Canada, I had high expectations for my stay at Fairmont Hotel Mumbai. Yet, nothing could have prepared me for the sheer luxury and attention to detail that this property delivers. From the moment you step into the hotel, you are transported into a world of elegance, where every aspect is meticulously designed to offer an unparalleled experience.

The check-in process was seamless, and the warmth of the staff was immediately evident. Manjali was incredibly welcoming, setting the perfect tone for our stay, while Atul went above and beyond by helping us weigh our bags in the room. It’s rare to come across a team so dedicated to ensuring guests have a flawless experience. Every staff member we encountered was genuinely kind, professional, and proactive in their service.

The rooms redefine comfort and sophistication. Every detail, from the plush bedding to the high-end amenities, exudes opulence. The ambiance is serene, and the cleanliness is impeccable—so much so that it doesn’t feel like you’re in India at all. The hotel is immaculately maintained, with a signature scent that enhances the overall sense of luxury.

Having stayed at the iconic Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai, I must admit that Fairmont has surpassed it in every possible way—hospitality, comfort, service, and overall experience. My wife, who initially had no plans to return to India, was completely blown away by this hotel. Fairmont Mumbai has completely changed our perception of luxury hospitality in the country.

What truly sets this property apart is the staff’s unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction. When I expressed my gratitude for the exceptional service, they humbly encouraged me to share any concerns if I had them—showing their dedication to continuous excellence. If hotels could be rated greater than five stars, Fairmont Mumbai would undoubtedly be on that list.

Fairmont Hotel Mumbai – The Definition of Ultra-Luxury

Having experienced Fairmont hotels in Cairo, Dubai, and Canada, I had high expectations for my stay at Fairmont Hotel Mumbai. Yet, nothing could have prepared me for the sheer luxury and attention to detail that this property delivers. From the moment you step into the hotel, you are transported into a world of elegance, where every aspect is meticulously designed to offer an unparalleled experience.

The check-in process was seamless, and the warmth of the staff was immediately evident. Manjali was incredibly welcoming, setting the perfect tone for our stay, while Atul went above and beyond by helping us weigh our bags in the room. It’s rare to come across a team so dedicated to ensuring guests have a flawless experience. Every staff member we encountered was genuinely kind, professional, and proactive in their service.

The rooms redefine comfort and sophistication. Every detail, from the plush bedding to the high-end amenities, exudes opulence. The ambiance is serene, and the cleanliness is impeccable—so much so that it doesn’t feel like you’re in India at all. The hotel is immaculately maintained, with a signature scent that enhances the overall sense of luxury.

Having stayed at the iconic Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai, I must admit that Fairmont has surpassed it in every possible way—hospitality, comfort, service, and overall experience. My wife, who initially had no plans to return to India, was completely blown away by this hotel. Fairmont Mumbai has completely changed our perception of luxury hospitality in the country.

What truly sets this property apart is the staff’s unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction. When I expressed my gratitude for the exceptional service, they humbly encouraged me to share any concerns if I had them—showing their dedication to continuous excellence. If hotels could be rated greater than five stars, Fairmont Mumbai would undoubtedly be on that list.

Fairmont Hotel Mumbai is nothing short of spectacular. If you’re looking for a world-class experience that rivals the best hotels globally, this is the place to be. Every moment here is curated to perfection, making it an unforgettable stay.

text.text:
We recently had the pleasure of staying at the newly opened Fairmont Mumbai Sahar, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations on every front. From the moment you enter, the architecture, interiors, and the sheer grandeur of the property make it clear that this is not just another 5-star hotel – it’s a true luxury retreat right in the heart of Mumbai.

Location & Convenience
One of the biggest advantages is its proximity to the airport – it's literally a 5-minute drive from the international terminal, which is a game-changer if you're flying in or out at odd hours. Despite being so close to the airport, once you're inside, it's peaceful and quiet – a perfect blend of convenience and calm.

Rooms & Views
The rooms are spacious, elegantly designed, and thoughtfully equipped with everything a modern traveler could need. My room had a lovely view overlooking the landscaped pool and garden area (was under maintenance) The bed was supremely comfortable, linens were high-quality, and the bathroom (with its fab bathtub)

Dining Experience at The Merchants
A special shoutout to Sutanuka, who helped us with our restaurant reservations at The Merchants. Her warmth, efficiency, and attention to detail made the entire dining experience feel personalized and memorable. The buffet spread at The Merchants was nothing short of spectacular – especially for vegetarians, which is often overlooked at luxury hotels. From Indian to Mediterranean and Asian cuisine, the variety was impressive. And the dessert station? A dream come true. Beautifully presented, and even better tasting – especially the mini pastries and the live ice cream counter!

Coffee & Cakes at Madeleine De Proust
Another gem within the hotel is their patisserie and café, Madeleine De Proust. Here, Ambika, the manager, was absolutely delightful. She knew her menu inside out and recommended some fantastic options. The cakes are some of the best I’ve had in Mumbai – light, moist, and not overly sweet. Their signature chocolate cake and the hazelnut éclair deserve a special mention. The coffee too – smooth, strong, and served just right.

Interiors & Architecture:
Every corner of the Hotel has thoughtful and extremly inspiring forms of art. From paintings to sculptures. Beautifully designed Interiors makes the place warm, hospitable but exciting!

Overall Experience
The service across the hotel was consistently warm and polished – the kind you expect from a Fairmont but rarely see executed so well in a newly launched property. Every staff member, from concierge to housekeeping, seemed genuinely invested in making guests feel welcome.

Final Thoughts
Whether you're a business traveler needing to stay close to the airport, or someone just looking to enjoy a weekend of luxury and pampering in the city, Fairmont Mumbai Sahar is a phenomenal choice. It’s rare to find a hotel that combines stunning design, exceptional service, and culinary brilliance under one roof – and this one does it seamlessly.

Already looking forward to my next stay.

Location - Beautiful part of the city, a 30-45min drive from the airport.
Introduction-
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the InterContinental Mumbai Marine Drive, and it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the warm and efficient service.
Special Shoutout -
A special shoutout to Shreejit, the front desk manager, who welcomed me with a smile and upgraded me to a beautiful Junior Suite.
More about the room -
The room was spacious, modern, and had a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub. The housekeeping team was also top-notch, ensuring the room was always immaculate.
Food & Beverage-
I dined at two of their restaurants: the All-Day Dining and the rooftop bar, Dome. The service was impeccable, especially thanks to Rodney and Ashutosh. The food was delicious, and the ambiance was fantastic, particularly at the Dome with its stunning views of the Arabian Sea.
Final Verdict -
Overall, my stay at the InterContinental Mumbai Marine Drive was truly wonderful. The hotel's prime location on Marine Drive, coupled with its luxurious accommodations and excellent service, made it an unforgettable experience.

My recent stay at The Intercontinental Hotel Marine Dr Mumbai, was exceptional. From the moment I arrived, I was enveloped in an atmosphere of refined elegance and impeccable service. The hotel was truly serene and had inviting ambiance.

The accommodations were simply exquisite. My spacious room boasted luxurious furnishings, top-of-the-line amenities, and breathtaking views of the Bay. The attention to detail was evident in every aspect of the room, from the plush bedding to the carefully curated selection of toiletries.

One of the highlights of my stay was the hotel’s world-class restaurant, L&S Bistro. The culinary experience was truly good. The menu featured a delightful array of gourmet dishes, expertly prepared with the freshest ingredients. The flavors were to my palette, and the presentation was pleasing.

The hotel’s staff was incredibly attentive and accommodating. They went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my stay was perfect. The staff was always happy to help me.
In conclusion, The Intercontinental Hotel Marine Dr Mumbai, is a truly exceptional property that offers an unforgettable luxury experience. The combination of elegant accommodations, impeccable service, and world-class dining makes it the ideal choice for discerning travelers seeking the very best in hospitality.

ITC Maratha is a luxury hotel located in Mumbai, India.
From the moment you enter the hotel, you are greeted with warm hospitality and a sense of luxury. The decor is a blend of traditional and modern elements, giving the hotel a unique and elegant atmosphere.

The hotel's dining options are excellent, with a range of restaurants offering a variety of cuisines, from Indian to Italian. The Peshwa Pavilion is a must-visit for their delicious breakfast buffet and high tea offerings.

From the elegant decor to the excellent dining options and exceptional service, every aspect of the hotel is carefully crafted to provide a top-notch experience. If you are looking for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Mumbai, I highly recommend ITC Maratha.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the magnificent ITC Maratha in Mumbai, and I can confidently say that it was an extraordinary experience that exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby to the day of my departure, I was treated with utmost warmth, impeccable service, and attention to detail that truly set this hotel apart.

First and foremost, the architectural beauty and regal ambiance of ITC Maratha left me awe-inspired. The hotel's stunning Mughal-inspired design seamlessly blends traditional elements with modern comforts, creating an inviting and luxurious atmosphere. The interior decor showcases a perfect harmony of intricate artwork, elegant furnishings, and rich textures, creating a truly opulent setting.

The staff at ITC Maratha deserve special recognition for their outstanding hospitality. Every member of the team went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was nothing short of perfection. From the friendly and efficient check-in process to the personalized attention throughout my stay, I felt like a valued guest. The staff's genuine warmth, professionalism, and willingness to accommodate my every need truly made me feel like royalty.

The accommodations at ITC Maratha are nothing short of exceptional. My room was exquisitely appointed with tasteful decor, plush furnishings, and modern amenities that catered to my every comfort. The attention to detail was impeccable, from the luxurious bedding to the thoughtfully curated amenities. Additionally, the room was meticulously maintained by the attentive housekeeping staff, ensuring a pristine and comfortable environment at all times.

The dining experiences at ITC Maratha were an absolute delight. The hotel offers a diverse range of restaurants and cuisines, each delivering an extraordinary culinary journey. The flavors, presentation, and service surpassed all expectations. Whether it was the authentic Indian cuisine at Peshawri or the global delicacies at Peshwa Pavilion, every meal was a treat for the senses. The skilled chefs and attentive staff truly made dining at ITC Maratha a memorable experience.

Beyond the exceptional accommodations and culinary offerings, ITC Maratha offers a wealth of facilities and services to cater to every guest's needs. The well-equipped fitness center, rejuvenating spa, and serene pool area provided ample opportunities for relaxation and wellness. The hotel's strategic location near Mumbai's international airport is an added convenience for travelers, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business purposes.

In conclusion, ITC Maratha is a true gem among luxury hotels. From the majestic architecture and opulent interiors to the impeccable service and world-class amenities, every aspect of my stay was truly exceptional. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough to anyone seeking an unforgettable and regal experience in Mumbai. I am already eagerly anticipating my next visit to ITC Maratha, where I know I will be greeted with open arms and experience another exceptional stay.

Situated along the shimmering shores of Juhu Beach, the hotel boasts mesmerizing views of the Arabian Sea, creating an ambiance that is both serene and captivating. The allure of the coastal landscape is only surpassed by the architectural marvel that is JW Marriott Juhu itself

Upon entering the palatial lobby, you are immediately greeted by warm smiles and impeccable service from the attentive staff. The check-in process is swift and seamless, ensuring that every moment of your stay is optimized for relaxation and enjoyment. And speaking of relaxation, the accommodations at JW Marriott Juhu redefine the concept of opulent comfort. The rooms and suites are tastefully adorned with plush furnishings, sumptuous linens, and state-of-the-art amenities, all meticulously curated to cater to the most discerning guests.

One of the standout features of JW Marriott Juhu is its unparalleled dining experiences. From world-class restaurants helmed by Michelin-starred chefs to charming cafes offering delectable treats, the culinary journey at this establishment is nothing short of extraordinary. Whether indulging in authentic Indian delicacies or savoring international gourmet delights, every meal is an exquisite affair that delights the senses and leaves a lasting impression on your palate.

For those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, the Quan Spa at JW Marriott Juhu is an oasis of tranquility. This sanctuary of wellness offers an array of rejuvenating treatments, blending ancient traditions with modern techniques, to soothe your body, mind, and soul. As you bask in the nurturing hands of skilled therapists, you'll find yourself transported to a realm of serenity and bliss.

Beyond the luxurious accommodations and epicurean delights, JW Marriott Juhu also caters to the needs of business travelers and event organizers. The hotel's state-of-the-art conference and banquet facilities are equipped with cutting-edge technology and a team of seasoned professionals who ensure that every event, whether corporate or social, is executed flawlessly.

It would be remiss not to mention the exceptional level of service that pervades every corner of JW Marriott Juhu. The staff's dedication to anticipating and fulfilling guests' desires is truly commendable. Their unwavering commitment to excellence ensures that your stay is nothing short of magical, leaving you with cherished memories to treasure for a lifetime.

In conclusion, JW Marriott Juhu is a jewel in the crown of luxury hospitality. With its unparalleled location, opulent accommodations, divine dining experiences, and impeccable service, it surpasses all expectations. Whether you seek a romantic getaway, a family vacation or a haven of indulgence, JW Marriott Juhu is a destination that will exceed your every wish. Prepare to be pampered, enchanted and enthralled as you immerse yourself in a world of lavishness and refinement at this remarkable hotel

It was a great experience at westin powai with wonderful lake view. Escape to a tranquil oasis in the heart of Mumbai's bustling suburbs at The Westin Powai. This 5-star luxury hotel offers a refreshing blend of modern amenities, stunning views, and warm hospitality.

Unwind in Style

- Relax in our beautifully landscaped gardens, perfect for a leisurely stroll
- Unwind with a rejuvenating spa treatment at our Heavenly Spa
- Take a dip in our sparkling outdoor pool, overlooking the serene Powai Lake

Savor Global Flavors

- Indulge in delicious cuisine at our signature restaurants, serving everything from authentic Indian to international flavors
- Enjoy a refreshing cocktail or two at our stylish bar, overlooking the lake

Conduct Business with Ease

- Host successful meetings and events in our state-of-the-art conference facilities
- Stay productive with our 24-hour business center and high-speed internet access

Experience Mumbai's Charm

- Explore the nearby Powai Lake, a popular spot for boating and bird-watching
- Visit the iconic Hiranandani Gardens, a shopper's paradise
- Discover the city's vibrant culture, from street food to street art

Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, The Westin Powai is the perfect retreat to unwind, recharge, and experience the best of Mumbai."

Nestled amidst the bustling metropolis of Mumbai, The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake offers a tranquil retreat that combines luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. From the moment I stepped foot into the hotel, I was captivated by its elegant ambiance and warm hospitality.

The location of The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake is simply breathtaking. Overlooking the picturesque Powai Lake, the hotel offers stunning views that are a feast for the eyes. The lush green surroundings create a serene atmosphere, providing a welcome respite from the chaos of the city.

The hotel's spacious and well-appointed rooms are a testament to its commitment to providing guests with a truly luxurious experience. From plush beds to modern amenities, every detail has been carefully thought out to ensure maximum comfort. The rooms also feature large windows that allow ample natural light to flood in, further enhancing the serene atmosphere.

The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake takes pride in its culinary offerings. The restaurants and bars on-site provide a diverse range of cuisines, satisfying even the most discerning palate. The attentive and friendly staff ensure that every dining experience is a memorable one.

What truly sets The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake apart is its impeccable service. The staff members go above and beyond to ensure that guests feel welcomed and cared for throughout their stay. From the concierge to the housekeeping team, everyone is dedicated to providing exceptional service with a genuine smile.

In conclusion, The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake is a hidden gem in the heart of Mumbai. With its stunning location, luxurious accommodations, and top-notch service, it offers a haven of tranquility amidst the bustling city. Whether you're a business traveler or seeking a leisurely escape, this hotel is a perfect choice for an unforgettable experience.

From the moment you step into the lobby of the Leela Mumbai, you are greeted with a sense of opulence and grandeur. The lobby is spacious and elegantly decorated with chandeliers, marble floors, and high ceilings. The staff is incredibly welcoming, and the check-in process is seamless and efficient.

The rooms at the Leela Mumbai are spacious, well-appointed, and beautifully designed with plush furnishings, elegant decor, and all the modern amenities you would expect from a 5-star hotel. The beds are comfortable, the bathrooms are spacious and well-stocked with high-quality toiletries, and the in-room dining service is prompt and efficient.

The hotel has an impressive array of dining options, from the Indian restaurant Jamavar to the Italian restaurant Six Degrees. The food is exquisite, with a wide variety of options to choose from, and the service is impeccable. The hotel also has a lovely poolside bar and a charming tea lounge, perfect for relaxing after a long day of meetings or sightseeing.

The Leela Mumbai is a great place to host meetings and events, with state-of-the-art facilities and attentive staff to ensure that everything runs smoothly. The hotel also has a well-equipped fitness center, a full-service spa, and a rooftop infinity pool with stunning views of the city.

Overall, the Leela Mumbai is a top-notch hotel that offers a luxurious and comfortable stay for business and leisure travelers alike. The staff is attentive and friendly, the facilities are world-class, and the attention to detail is second to none. If you're looking for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Mumbai, the Leela Mumbai is definitely worth considering.

I had an exceptional stay at Taj The trees vikhroli. From the moment I arrived, the service was impeccable. The staff were attentive, friendly, and genuinely went out of their way to ensure my comfort. The check in was smooth and the welcome drink was amazing which was served by a down syndrome autistic child which was an amazing step for helping them. A special thanks to Miss Vanita for an early check in as requested before and for decorating the room for our anniversary. The room was spacious, elegantly decorated, and spotlessly clean, with a breathtaking view of  the mangroves
The amenities were top-notch, including the luxurious spa, state-of-the-art fitness center, and exquisite dining options also their jaccuzi and infinity swimming pool. Breakfast each morning was a highlight, with a diverse selection of delicious dishes.

The attention to detail and the overall ambiance made my stay unforgettable. I highly recommend Taj The trees for anyone looking to experience true luxury and outstanding service. I’ll definitely be returning!

The staff at Tajmahal Tower were incredibly welcoming and attentive, always going above and beyond to ensure that my stay was as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Whether I needed recommendations for local restaurants or help with arranging transportation, they were always happy to assist me.

My room was simply stunning, with luxurious furnishings and breathtaking views of the surrounding area. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the amenities provided were top-notch. I recently had the pleasure of staying at this luxurious hotel with lavish rooms. While the experience was undeniably indulgent, it's important to note that it comes at a premium price.

The rooms were nothing short of opulent, with elegant furnishings, plush bedding, and stunning decor that exuded a sense of grandeur. The attention to detail was impeccable, and every comfort was thoughtfully provided. From the spacious bathrooms to the breathtaking views from the windows, there was no shortage of extravagance.

The hotel's amenities also lived up to its reputation. The on-site dining options were exquisite, offering a wide range of culinary delights. The spa and wellness facilities were top-notch, ensuring relaxation and rejuvenation for guests. The attentive and professional staff added to the overall positive experience, making us feel like valued guests.

text.text:
I recently stayed at the Sofitel Mumbai BKC and I must say it was an exceptional experience. The hotel is located in the business district of BKC and is very convenient for both leisure and business travelers. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted by the warm and friendly staff who made me feel welcome.

The room was spacious, clean and had a very elegant decor. The bed was comfortable and I had a great night's sleep. The bathroom was also spotless and had all the amenities I needed. The room also had a balcony which had a beautiful view of the city.

The hotel has several dining options, I dined at the main restaurant and the food was delicious. The breakfast buffet had a wide variety of options to choose from. The hotel also has a rooftop infinity pool which was a great way to relax and unwind after a long day.

The staff at the hotel were always willing to help and went out of their way to make my stay comfortable. The concierge service was also very helpful in arranging my sightseeing tours.

Overall, I had a fantastic stay at Sofitel Mumbai BKC and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Mumbai. The hotel's location, amenities and service were all top-notch. I look forward to returning to this hotel in the future

text.text:
Fariyas Hotel Mumbai
Is a 4 star hotel in Mumbai, having 5 star amenities and services.

We take immense pleasure in introducing ourselves as one of the best luxury budget hotels in Mumbai, all keeping in mind the need of today’s business travellers we offer discounts to guests looking for accommodation in Colaba (South Mumbai).

We offer pretty appealing concessions to long-staying guests in South Mumbai.
Avail early bird discount, when booking online.
Enjoy offers & rebates on group bookings and banquet requirements.
We are located near to commercial and tourist spots in Colaba.
We are a 4-star property in Mumbai, we are well recognized by our finest facilities like elegant guest rooms with breathtaking sea views, multi-cuisine restaurant, poolside restaurant, bar, café, business center, fitness center, beauty salon & spa, and outdoor swimming pool.
Rooms & Suites

Our accommodation offers a luxurious getaway that endeavors the comfort of our esteemed guests. Our modern and sophisticated rooms laced with opulence and majestic views are just perfect for enrichment seekers. Our aim is not only to cater stay but an experience.
￼
VIEW DETAILS
Wine and Dine

Fariyas Resort splendor is not only restricted to its ethereal beauty but also offers superlative restaurants Tavern- the Signature Bar, Tamarind – a multi-cuisine fine dining restaurant, and Tamarind – the poolside restaurant, exclusive for grills, barbecued dishes and curries, and a coffee shop that serves all-day breakfast.
Hours: Lunch – 12:30pm to 3:30pm | Dinner – 7:30pm to 11:00pm

￼
VIEW DETAILS
Meetings & Conferences

Plan for success at Crystal Fariyas, Mumbai. We offer modern and elegant meeting rooms with excellent amenities such as advanced projection, free-high speed internet ideal for corporate meetings, seminars, product launches, and many more.
￼
VIEW DETAILS
Places of Interest

Exhibiting a traditional charm, Colaba is a historic area situated in south Mumbai. This area is known for its architectural monuments and intricate age old buildings that still reverberate their natural appeal. The old movie talkies and the cafes are entertaining the older people that wander around this pleasing locality
